api_url.description: The url for the API service

max_pages.description: The maximum number of pages you'd like to get. If you'd like to get them all use a very high number.

per_page.description: How many objects per page. The WP REST API max is a hard 100.

user_agent.description: The user agent set in the header of the request.

username.description: If a password is required, this is the username. This should be set as an environment variable.

application_password.description: If a password is required, this is the password. This should be an application password and set as an environment variable.
